content.text: Metallic elements of the pathway system shall be earthed in accordance with the planning information. The  connections shall be safeguarded against corrosion and a good electrical contact between all parts ensured  (maintenance periods may be dependent upon the environment, see EN 50174-1).
The ends of any conduits or sub-conduits that are not intended to be subjected to the imminent installation of  cables or cable elements shall be sealed to prevent ingress of water.
